welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Massarosa, a charming city known for its rich history, picturesque landscapes, and warm hospitality. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture, taste our delicious cuisine, and explore all the wonders this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, mainly used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lucca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lucca Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
